Catherine.text: This lengthened absence , these solitary rambles , did not speak a mind at ease , or a conscience void of reproach . ”
I was going to take you into what was my mother ’s room — the room in which she died — ”
It remains as it was , I suppose ? ”
And how long ago may it be that your mother died ? ”
She has been dead these nine years . ”
You were with her , I suppose , to the last ? ”
I was unfortunately from home . Her illness was sudden and short ; and , before I arrived it was all over . ”
often walks about the room in this way ; it is nothing unusual . ”

The latter.text: I have many pamphlets to finish , ”

before I can close my eyes , and perhaps may be poring over the affairs of the nation for hours after you are asleep . Can either of us be more meetly employed ? _ My _ eyes will be blinding for the good of others , and _ yours _ preparing by rest for future mischief . ”
